short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple flat dark grey theme for Reddit..

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple smooth dark theme for Reddit. This theme can be toggled on and off from the toolbar button. When the extension is enabled, reddit.com is displayed in dark theme. This extension does not have any options at the moment. Just a toolbar button to get enabled or disabled.
